name: Tao.
body:
TAO is the simplest app in the world.
It doesn't have a menu, you don't have to type. Every interaction between human  and the smart phone will make the chang of Yinyang.
Like the word of god,Many adults don't know how to use it! But children do!
It is not just a game, or a tool or a way of interaction. It is a brand new world. 
Right now, when we spend more time playing with our smart phones, do we still remember what a smart phone is actually for?
 TAO contains the secret of how artificial intelligence will bring singularity! 
This app will be used to help you give up all choices made by your brain, just follow your heart and open the world of inspiration! 
Why Steve Jobs left the only entity key on iphone. Theoretically, a smart can work even it doesn't have any key. 
It's looking for TAO.

道是全世界最简单的app。
它没有菜单，不需要打字，每一次人与手机的接触都会带来阴阳的变化。
就像神的语言，很多大人们搞不懂，孩子们却明白。
它不仅是游戏，工具或交互方式，它是一个崭新的世界。
如今，当我们在现实中相遇却各自低头玩着手机，我们似乎忘记了手机到底是用来干什么的。
道包含了实现人工智能让奇点来临的秘密。它会帮助你放弃一切用大脑作出的选择，只跟随内心，开启灵性世界。
为什么乔布斯要在苹果上留下唯一一颗实体键。理论上手机没有任何按钮也是可以的。
因为道。
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
